caption: eCell MSIT hosted a transformative “Understanding Entrepreneurship” session on 8th November, featuring Karan Kumar Singh, a startup expert. He shared invaluable insights on turning ideas into successful ventures, covering innovation, strategy, and growth. The event inspired attendees to pursue their entrepreneurial dreams. More events coming soon! #eCellMSIT #Entrepreneurship #StartupSuccess
